评论概述: These are COMFORTABLE? I missed out!
评论详情: Well, I'm writing this AFTER having worn the shoes. I saw so many folks commenting on the comfort, and I'm just curious if I just have sensitive feet, or what. I purchased a pair of these black & white pumps to match a dress I had for a viewing/funeral mass... so I was not walking much at all, and standing time was not crazy or anything... but man were my feet killing me. Super disappointing because while the price point is not bad, not sure if it's worth one time of use. I imagine I'd find more comfort with some cushiony insoles, but these are very true to size, and I'd expect to run into trouble with tightness if I were to try a good insole. Other than that, the shoes are darling and reminded me of the saddle shoes I used to wear as a really little kid. Overall, I give it a "meh." I love these shoes, but I'm really afraid to wear them again!
Shoes are cute. Fair quality for the price. Size up, shoes run small.
